name: P2U Bat Vtuber Model
description:
An adorable, affordable bat model made in Live2D for vtubing use!

Pay-to-use and enjoy playing with it and using it on your streams, videos, or just for fun!

Ideal for those who can't get a custom model at the time, or just want to explore the technology without a big commitment!

Fully rigged, with physics and toggleable expressions as seen in the showcase video!

Load it up into your favorite Live2D compatible face tracking program*!

Proper credit is required (a link back to this store page is fine), but you can use it on your streams and videos all you like and even accept donations and subscriptions without any strings attached!

*I have only tested this model in VTube Studio so I cannot guarantee how it will work in other facetracking programs, nor provide support for using it in those apps.
